io.github.struppigel.parser

Class Mapping

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.struppigel.parser.Mapping

  • public class Mapping
extends java.lang.Object
    Maps all addresses of a virtual range to all addresses of the physical range.

    Both ranges have to be of the same size. The bytes are read from file only on request, making it possible to map large files.

      • apply

        public byte apply(long virtOffset)
        Returns the byte at the virtual offset. Requires the offset to be within the virtual range of the mapping.

        Parameters:
        virtOffset - the virtual offset to read the byte from
        Returns:
        byte at virtOffset

      • apply

        public byte[] apply(long virtOffset,
                    int size)
        Returns size number of bytes at the virtual offset from mapping m. Requires the offset + size to be within the virtual range of the mapping.

        Parameters:
        virtOffset - the virtual offset to start reading the bytes from
        size - of the returned array
        Returns:
        array containing the bytes starting from virtOffset
